A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautifully shot and  wonderfully acted with compelling new characters (shout out to Kelly Marie Tran). I love the overall message of The Last Jedi\, but it suffers from too many lousy story beats. CGI horse races\, giant spaceships running out of fuel\, a jaded Luke Skywalker\, characters making bad decisions seemly just for plot reasons... I don't hate this movie\, but it will be a very long time before I want to rewatch it.
